original: intros s sigma H. induction s. - simpl. auto. - simpl in *. intros a p H1. apply u_conv_1_invar_3 in H1. specialize (H a p H1). destruct H as [n [H2 H3]]. apply u_conv_1_invar_1 in H1. exists n. split; auto. - simpl in *. specialize (IHs1 sigma). specialize (IHs2 sigma). intros a p H1. apply state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset_M2 in H. destruct H as [H4 H5]. destruct (state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset_M2 (umpl_conv_1 s0) (umpl_conv_1 s1) sigma a H1) as [H6 H7]. + apply IHs1. auto. + apply IHs2. auto.
